title: THE MAN WHO DISTURBED THE UNIVERSE
description:
Mental Hospital of Chania . A cohort hosts the creators of the documentary " ecclesia ", the place where they trade and converse , where some ask katostariko and another asking why . In the place where they manage their beauty and their relationship well .

Another group of former chronic patients except Psychiatric Hospital now experiencing a painful process of social reintegration and venturing in the context of international trade , a weekly trip to Denmark .

The film, through the parallel ratio of the two groups , trying to hear the plea of insanity , its chaotic delirium, the crust of a deep sea . Trying to see the dramatic conflict between man and the madness , the deepest despair and utter doubt about any aspect is involved .

"If our life surrounds death, our mental health hovers insanity ." In madness , the man feels that he has nowhere to return to . Not anymore. It was .

Honors at 2nd International Documentary Festival Kalamata (October 2000)

Greek Special Prize for Best Creative Documentary by the International Jury Prize and Best Greek Movie ( equally with the documentary The License ) from the Greek Directors Guild .

Directed by : Stavros Psyllakis
Scenario : Stavros Psyllakis
Research Associates : Dr. George Kokkinakos , Dr. Anthony Liodakis Institute Beyond
Photographer: Kostas pulse
Music: Nick Witte
Sound: Epaminondas CHATZINIKOLA
Image Editing - Audio : Demosthenes Raptis
Narration : Apostolis Assimakis
Production: Greek Film Center , Stavros Psyllakis
Editing: Giorgos Triantafyllou
Production : Stavros Psyllakis

A co-production with the Greek Film Centre .
